src:
Chelsea Menang, Frank Lampard Keluhkan Kesalahan VAR Ini
03 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Frank Lampard percaya Premier League masih belum menjalin hubungan mesra dengan VAR. Penggunaan teknologi itu tampaknya belum benar-benar menciptakan sepak bola yang lebih baik.
Lampard bicara setelah intervensi VAR yang membantu Watford mencetak gol di menit akhir pada kemenangan 2-1 Chelsea di Vicarage Road, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari WIB. The Blues unggul sempat nyaman unggul 2-0, tapi kesulitan di 10 menit terakhir.
Saat itu, Gerard Delofeu berhasil menyempurnakan kesempatan penalti di menit ke-80 yang mengubah skor jadi 1-2. Penalti ini dihadiahkan usai wasit Anthony Taylor mengecek VAR.
Keputusan inilah yang dikeluhkan Lampard. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Chelsea Wins, Frank Lampard Complains About This VAR Error
Nov 03 2019, 10:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Frank Lampard believes the Premier League has not yet formed an intimate relationship with VAR. The use of technology does not seem to have really created better football.
Lampard spoke after the VAR intervention that helped Watford score in the final minutes in Chelsea's 2-1 victory at Vicarage Road on Sunday (3/11/2019) early morning hrs. The Blues won comfortably 2-0 up, but struggled in the last 10 minutes.
At that time, Gerard Delofeu managed to perfect the penalty opportunity in the 80th minute which changed the score to 1-2. This penalty was awarded after the referee Anthony Taylor checked the VAR.
This decision complained to Lampard. Read below, Bolaneters!
